column5: there was a case of intentional violence in Sdao village
column9: Kandal province.------The victim was a monk named Khin Konon
column10: a 34-year-old living in the pagoda. He was injured on his face and right hand.------The suspect named Pak Samnang
column12: was staying in the pagoda as a student.------ Before the incident
column13: the victim asked suspects to go and buy soap
column14: but the suspect did not go. When the monk scolded the man
column15: he took a hoe and set about the monk.------Subsequently
column16: the victim filed a complaint at the police station and the------suspect and evidence were taken away for legal proceedings. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/458736
